These vendors are obligated to use your information only for the purpose of providing services to Wow Health. We may also disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of ourselves or others."}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"space-y-4","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold","children":"Your Choices"}],["$","p",null,{"children":["You can access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us at"," ",["$","span",null,{"className":"font-extrabold","children":"mails.wowhealth@gmail.com"}],"."]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"space-y-4","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold","children":"Security"}],["$","p",null,{"children":"We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
